issue.title: [Python][ORC] Expose stripe size ORCWriter API
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13571](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13571). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As duscussed [in this Dask issue](https://github.com/dask/dask/pull/7756#discussion_r682908950), it would be useful if the `ORCWriter`/`write_table` API allowed the user to specify a specific stripe size.  I would expect the argument/usage to be similar to `row_group_size` in `pyarrow.parquet.write_table`.
